column1: # ATTN: SUSPENDED AUG 2020 Fenway Health Helpline
column4: Not 24/7! 25+ M-Sa 6pm-11pm ET; <25 M-Sa 5p-11pm. Fenway Health provides information, help, and referrals to LGBT callers. Provide medical and mental health support. They have a Sidney Borum Jr Center that serves LGBTQ+ people 12-29.

column4: Toronto-based online community group offering resources and support for the Aboriginal 2-Spirit community. M-F 9:30am-6pm ET.
